#===================================================================== MARVEL =====================================================

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(mongolite)
library(xml2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
url4 <- "https://www.marvel.com/comics"
html <- read_html(url4)
```

```{r}
Judul <- html %>% 
    html_nodes("h2") %>% 
    html_text(trim = TRUE)
```

```{r}
Judul <- as.data.frame(Judul)
Judul <- Judul[-c(1, 17,38,59, 19, 24, 27, 30, 36, 37), ]
Judul <- as.data.frame(Judul)
Judul
```

```{r}
Penulis <- html %>% 
    html_nodes("ul") %>% 
    html_text(trim = TRUE)
```

```{r}
Daftar_Komik <- data.frame(Judul, Penulis)
Daftar_Komik
```
